title: Doctoral student opportunity: Turing Enrichment Scheme now open.
summary: The Turing Enrichment Scheme opens on the 14th of November 2022.
body: The Turing Enrichment Scheme is for PhD students looking to enhance and broaden their research within the Turing community. Applications for the eighth Turing Enrichment cohort starting in Autumn 2023 open on the 14th November 2022. If you are interested in applying please join the open events to learn more. For full details of the 2023-24 scheme and open events please see Turing Enrichment.

title: Research Software Engineer (RSE) / Associate RSE for Machine Learning
summary: Job Opportunity at the University of Sheffield - Department of Computer Science
body: We welcome applications to join our world-class research software engineering team as a Research Software Engineer (RSE) or Associate RSE for Machine Learning. See more information here.

title: Turing Internship Scheme Opportunities and Data Study Groups
summary: Turing has launched a new round of the Turing Internship Network (TIN), with 27 internship opportunities.
body:
Turing has launched a new round of the Turing Internship Network (TIN), with 27 internship opportunities being offered by our TIN partners and collaborators in areas of research spanning from data science and responsible AI, to digital twins, to graph machine learning, to synthetic data generation.

For this call, we have expanded our internship offering to include our joint programme connecting TIN with our Data Study Groups (DSG). Interns will be placed at environment and sustainability charities and NGOs where they will develop a challenge for a DSG which will take place in early 2023.
